text: Gabriel Paletta (born 15 February 1986) is an Argentine football player. He plays for Boca Juniors. He was born in Argentina to parents of Italian descent. He represented his birth nation at the under-20 level, taking part in the 2005 Fifa World Youth Championship in the Netherlands.
